PYREZ_AUTH_ID.description: Used for authentication. This is the authentication key that you receive from Hi-Rez Studios.

PYREZ_DEV_ID.description: Used for authentication. This is the developer ID that you receive from Hi-Rez Studios.

APP_SECRET_TOKEN.description: A secret key, automaticaly generated by heroku, for verifying the integrity of signed cookies and could be used to hash some passwords.

description: Unofficial Hi-Rez Studios API documentation (and assets where possible) for Paladins, Realm Royale, and Smite.
name: hirez-api-docs
